title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’. Provides a thin wrapper over the local Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, published on PyPI as ‘ollama’. Supports sync/async APIs and streaming responses.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration that wraps Ollama models as LLM and ChatModel components for chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed to ‘Open WebUI’). Offers chat history, model management, RAG, and multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli (salty-flower/ollama-cli)
summary: Cross-platform TUI (Terminal UI) for Ollama written in Rust, providing interactive model selection and chat sessions.

title: ollama-copilot (github-copilot-ollama)
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model instead of OpenAI.

title: ollama-rag (impira/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) example using Ollama, LangChain, and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama4j (ollama-java)
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and fluent API, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Lightweight Discord bot that answers questions using a local Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-nvim (nomnivore/ollama-nvim)
summary: Neovim plugin to generate code or chat with Ollama models directly from the editor using Lua.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a containerized service for CI pipelines, enabling local LLM tests.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that adds OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for building NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Tiny shell library exposing curl one-liners for every Ollama REST endpoint; useful for Bash scripting.

title: ollama-rust (pepperoni21/ollama-rust)
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing async/await bindings to the Ollama REST API with serde models.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama, showcasing session state and streaming text.

title: ollama-go (mxyng/ollama-go)
summary: Unofficial Go client library for Ollama with code generation from OpenAPI spec and examples.

title: ollama-csharp (AsakusaRinne/ollama-csharp)
summary: Community C# SDK for Ollama targeting .NET 6+ with async enumerable streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-models (ollama/ollama-models)
summary: Official registry of Modelfile definitions and quantized GGUF weights for Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.
